ing: 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, room temperature
des: "This is the cheese filling I use for several different sweet breads and it tastes like cheesecake.  Everyone loves it.  Can be used to fill kolachkes, braids or even dropped in the center of chocolate cupcakes -- yummy but loaded with calories."
ins: In a medium bowl, cream together cream cheese and sugar.  Beat in egg and vanilla.  Refrigerate before using to fill pastries prior to baking them.
